original_title: Just Back from Los Angeles: A Portrait of Yvonne Rainer
overview: Adam Pendletonâ€™s Just Back From Los Angeles: A Portrait of Yvonne Rainer is the third in a series of video portraits, following My Education: A Portrait of David Hilliard, the former chief of staff for the Black Panthers, and Lorraine O'Grady: A Portrait.
title: Just Back from Los Angeles: A Portrait of Yvonne Rainer
